text:
Goodbye, Pyotr Petrovitch

Tension fills the room; Dounia stands firm.  
Pulcheria Alexandrovna: “Good heavens!”  

Raskolnikov: “Aren’t you ashamed now, sister?”  
Dounia: “I am ashamed, Rodya.”  
Dounia: “Pyotr Petrovitch, go away!”  

---  

Pyotr Petrovitch is in disbelief; anger simmers.  
Pyotr Petrovitch: “I will never come back!”  
Dounia: “What insolence! I don’t want you!”  

Pulcheria Alexandrovna: “What right have you?”  
Pulcheria Alexandrovna: “Go away! We were wrong!”  
Pyotr Petrovitch: “You’ve bound me by your promise!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Dounia firmly rejects Pyotr Petrovitch's advances, leading to a heated confrontation with her family.
